name: Smartwool Mountaineering Extra Heavy Crew - Unisex
description: Heavyweight socks with extra-heavy cushion for warmth and comfort on extra-cold or extra-long adventures.Made of merino wool, nylon and spandex to keep your feet cool in the summer, warm in winter.Merino is naturally antimicrobial to prevent your feet from getting funky.Flat-knit toe seam construction eliminates chafing and hot spots.
